name: Oga's Cantina at the Disneyland Resort
location: Disneyland Park, Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge

items.title: Rancor Beer Flight Souvenir Board with Four Teeth
items.description: (Alcoholic) enjoy a sampling of each Beer

items.title: The Grinning Loth-cat
items.description: Guava Juice, Coconut Milk, Lime Juice, Pure Cane Syrup, topped with Basil Crystals

items.title: The Grinning Loth-cat with Souvenir Mug
items.description: Guava Juice, Coconut Milk, Lime Juice, Pure Cane Syrup, topped with Basil Crystals, served in a souvenir Loth-cat Carved Mug

items.title: Black Spire Brew
items.description: Cold Brew Joffrey's Coffee®, Falernum, Honey Mango Syrup, Citrus Juice

items.title: Blurrgfire
items.description: Minute Maid® Lemonade, Pomegranate Juice, and Habanero-Lime

items.title: Jabba Juice
items.description: Simply Orange® with Pineapple, Kiwi, Cantaloupe, and Blueberry Flavor-filled Boba

items.title: Moogan Tea
items.description: Gold Peak® Unsweetened Tea, Chocolate Milk, Vanilla, and Cinnamon, topped with Vanilla Whipped Cream, Cinnamon & Sugar-dusted Cereal

items.title: Tarine Tea
items.description: Gold Peak® Unsweetened Tea, Peach, Huckleberry, and Mint

items.title: Blue Bantha
items.description: Blue Milk served chilled with Bantha-inspired Brown Butter Chocolate Chip and Coconut Cookie

items.title: Hyperdrive (Punch It!)
items.description: Powerade® Mountain Berry Blast, White Cranberry Juice, Black Cherry Purée, and Sprite®

items.title: Surabat Valley Harvest Board
items.description: Torched Sourdough Bread, Aji Verde-infused Pork Spread, Spicy Salsa Criolla

items.title: Reythan Crackers and Moss Mousse
items.description: Wheat Chip with Avocado Mousse, Salsa, Lime Aire

items.title: Garlic-Cheese Five Blossom Bread with Spicy Cheese Sauce
items.description: Warm Garlic Parmesan Pretzel Knot and Chile de Arbol Cheese Sauce

items.title: Spiced Wroshyr Pods
items.description: Seasoned Edamame, Sliced Cucumbers, spicy Citrus-Gochujang Dip

items.title: Oga's Obsession
items.description: Minute Maid® Lemonade, Wild Strawberry Flavor, Yogurt-filled Popping Spheres, Strawberry & Grape Candy Pebbles, with a bursting Dried Fruit Mixture

items.title: High Republic
items.description: Patrón Silver Tequila, Triple Sec, Lime Juice, Pure Cane & Habanero-Lime Syrups, topped with Red Wine

items.title: Takodana Quencher
items.description: Bacardi Dragonberry Rum, Bols Blue Curaçao, Simply Orange® with Pineapple, Kiwi flavors

items.title: Jet Juice
items.description: Maker's Mark Bourbon, Chile Liqueur, Pomegranate Liqueur, White Grape Juice and Lemon Juice

items.title: Jedi Mind Trick
items.description: Ketel One Botanical Grapefruit and Rose Vodka, BroVo Lucky Falernum Liqueur, Bols Blue Curaçao, White Grape Juice, Lime Juice, and Grapefruit Bitters

items.title: Angry Bloody Rancor
items.description: Potato Vodka, Clam-Tomato Juice, Kimchee Base, Gochujang Pepper, Lime Juice, Lemon Juice, garnished with a Spicy Candied Rancor Bacon

items.title: Yub Nub
items.description: Malibu Pineapple Rum, Sailor Jerry Spiced Rum, Citrus Juices, and Passion Fruit

items.title: The Outer Rim
items.description: Patrón Silver Tequila, Pomegranate Liqueur, Lime Juice, and Pure Cane Sugar, topped with Exotic Fruit Purée, rimmed with Black Salt

items.title: Fuzzy Tauntaun
items.description: Cîroc Peach Vodka, Bols Peach Schnapps, and Simply Orange® topped with Tangerine, Pure Cane Sugar, "Buzz Button Tingling" Foam

items.title: Coruscant Cooler
items.description: Maker's Mark Bourbon, Maraska Maraschino Liqueur, Carpano Antica Sweet Vermouth, Cranberry Juice, Lime Juice

items.title: Yub Nub with souvenir Endor Mug
items.description: Malibu Pineapple Rum, Sailor Jerry Spiced Rum, Citrus Juices, and Passion Fruit served in a souvenir Endor mug

items.title: Mythosaur Mug
items.description: served with Ne’tra gal Ale

items.title: Black Squadron Lager
items.description: Golden Lager with a touch of Honey (Delahunt Brewing) (ABV 4.8%)

items.title: Jogan Blossom Hazy IPA
items.description: Ube-flavored Hazy IPA with Floral Notes

items.title: Bad Motivator IPA
items.description: (ABV 6.0%) Tropical India Pale Ale with Galaxy and Comet Hops (Sierra Nevada Brewing Co.)

items.title: Gamorrean Ale
items.description: (ABV 5.2%) Red Ale with Roasted Caramel, Hop character, and touch of Grapefruit (New Belgium Brewing Co.)

items.title: White Wampa Ale
items.description: (ABV 4.5%) Classic Hefeweizen with a Banana and Citrus character (Ballast Point Brewing Co.)

items.title: Imperial Guard, Goldschmidt Vineyards, Sonoma
items.description: Fully clad Crimson-colored, nicely Focused Red Cherry and Raspberry Aromas combined robust Red Berry Fruit flavors, a touch of Caramel, Dark Chocolate, and Spice with long, supple Tannins

items.title: Toniray, Goldschmidt Vineyards, Sonoma
items.description: Formerly produced on Alderaan, Teal-colored, refreshing Crisp style, Aroma characteristics of Green Apple and Meyer Lemon with flavors of juicy White Peach, Apricot and a hint of Vanilla
